competitors.name: Microsoft Intune
competitors.notes: Enterprise device management with Windows focus

competitors.name: Mosyle
competitors.notes: Apple device management for education and business

context: In 2020, Jamf went public (July 2020 IPO) as the leading Apple device management platform. The pandemic accelerated remote work and device management needs. Jamf's exclusive Apple focus differentiated against multi-platform competitors. Microsoft Intune grew with Microsoft 365 adoption. New Apple-focused competitors emerged in the market.
